name: personalidentifier
label: Personal identifier
description: A unique proper name or character sequence that identifies this particular person. (NCIT:C164337)

name: phenotypicsex
label: Phenotypic sex
description: An organismal quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's physical expression of sexual characteristics. (PATO:0001894)

name: genotypicsex
label: Genotypic sex
description: A biological sex quality inhering in an individual based upon genotypic composition of sex chromosomes. (PATO:0020000)

name: ancestry
label: Ancestry
description: Population category defined using ancestry informative markers (AIMs) based on genetic/genomic data. (NCIT:C176763)

name: countryofbirth
label: Country of birth
description: The country that this person was born in. (GENEPIO:0001094)

name: yearofbirth
label: Year of birth
description: The year in which this person was born. (NCIT:C83164)

name: inclusionstatus
label: Inclusion status
description: An indicator that provides information on the current health status of this person. (NCIT:C166244)

name: ageatdeath
label: Age at death
description: The age at which death occurred. (NCIT:C135383)

name: primaryaffiliatedinstitute
label: Primary affiliated institute
description: The most significant institute for medical consultation and/or study inclusion in context of the genetic disease of this person. (NCIT:C25412)

name: resourcesinotherinstitutes
label: Resources in other institutes
description: Material or data related to this person that is not captured by this system though known to be available in other institutes such as biobanks or hospitals. (NCIT:C19012)

name: participatesinstudy
label: Participates in study
description: Reference to the study or studies in which this person participates. (RO:0000056)
